title: Hello, my low priority queue is bugged since a couple of months
body:
Hi welcome to my Thread,

I will not explain how it came to the point that iam in the low priority queue, i had a lot of disconnections, so flame i you want but i dont care.
My Problem is that when i enter queue it goes normal for a few minutes, then the connection is gone for like 2 seconds and iam kicked out of the queue.
I tried several things like the hextech repair tool wich isnt working for me atm.
My connection to my router is perfect.
And I asked the suppport team threw a ticket. One guy told me i should add Firewallexceptions, like five of them.
Nothing worked.

Okay iam done with league if u cant help me i go on playing other games.
But i like league so please help.

replies.body: Were you able to keep talking with the techs in your ticket? If troubleshooting your firewalls didn't help your connection there are a few other steps they can guide you through like adjusted your DNS servers to 8.8.8.8/8.8.4.4. Give that a shot as well using the step in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you aren't sure how, but please also open that ticket back up to followup with the techs for more in-depth help!
